LanguageData.RK_Ballista_Strait_Body.label: 발리스타
LanguageData.RK_Ballista_Strait_Body.description: 큰 화살을 발사하는 노포. 맞으면 끔살당함.

LanguageData.RK_Turret_Ballista_Strait.description: Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
